title: How to Make Ready Made Noodles

steps.headline: Pour the water into a cooking pot.
After 3 to 4 minutes the water will begin to boil.
Next break the noodles bit by bit and place in a container.
Add flavoring powder with salt if you want.
Mix until golden yellow (or red, if it is spicy.)
Turn the stove off and let it to cool down.
Pour noodles into bowl and it's ready to eat!

text: Pour the water into a cooking pot.  After 3 to 4 minutes the water will begin to boil.  Next break the noodles bit by bit and place in a container.  Add to the boiling water.  Stir until it softens.  Add flavoring powder with salt if you want.  Mix until golden yellow (or red, if it is spicy.)  Turn the stove off and let it to cool down.  Pour noodles into bowl and it's ready to eat!  Have fun eating noodles.
